paper_keywords: Uncertain LQ optimal control with jump
paper_abstract: Based on the uncertain optimal control with jump, in this paper, we study a kind of special uncertain optimal control problem: linear-quadratic (LQ) uncertain optimal control problem with jump which has a quadratic objective function for a linear uncertain control system with jump. We obtain a necessary and sufficient condition for the existence of optimal control. As an application, we discuss an uncertain LQ optimal control problem for the enterprize's investment decisions. paper_title: Uncertain optimal control of linear quadratic models with jump
